metadata.title: Revive, Broken City, Your Peace At an End

tracks.text: Sunraku's muscular body, covered in the scars of Lycagon's mark, walks across an expanse under the night sky and nearly full moon.
Debris floats
Backdropped by lightning, text reads, Shangri-La Frontier
Ink sketch of Sunraku's face. The ink splatters, and Emul falls through it. Sunraku catches her, and she crawls onto his shoulder. Behind him is a picture of Rakuro
Pencilgon smiles at us. Behind her is a picture of Towa Amane.
Katzo's hands burn with fire. Behind her is Kei Uomi.
Psyger strikes the grown with the purple long sword Antinomy.
A nest of interlocking lines forms. Ceecrue, a white rabbit samurai, leaps across them.
Outstretched hands form a diamond. Akitsu Akane's face smiles in the gap.
Rust holds a bow and Mold holds a staff.
Chains wrap around Sunraku's legs
Rakuro reaches up a hand. A hand reaches towards the metal spine in the ruins of past glories.
Psyger-0, Sunraku, Katzo, and Pencilgon stand side by side.
The chains shatter.
In red, fishmen wield swords and race towards the party in a circle.
The fishmen charge Stude at the wheel of the ship.
A mermaid fights a shark.
Giant octopus arms wrap around the Crying Innsman
A girl with blue eyes and white hair dances. Star Rain, Sylvia Goldberg. She falls into the floor, the floor rotates, and a white super hero replaces her. Galaxia Series, The Meteus
A brown haired girl turns into a tree girl. Nitro Squad.
In front of her stands an old man samurai and a young man with gauntlets.
A whale swims, its face engulfed with fire. It approaches an expanse with floating debris. Sunraku walks.
Lightning crackles across the whale. It opens its mouth. Darkness.
Text, 44, Revive, Broken City, Your Peace At an End
Sunraku charges.
More fishmen appear around the frill shark
She fires
A fishman jumps at Sunraku. The magic edge strikes it. It dissipates.
3 fishmen converge on Sunraku. He leaps up and away. The Frill Shark turns.
The FrillShark swings an anchor. Sunraku parries.
He strikes dozens of times, rapidly, stacking up Crits.
Sunraku charges. FrillShark grabs its anchor and swings. Sunraku dodges up.
He flips over FrillShark's head, landing 2 strikes on its back.
FrillShark runs
FrillShark swings. Anchor approaches Stude's head. A hammer hits the anchor, sending it flying.
The anchor crashes to the deck, killing a fishman.
The fishmen look. Stude gapes. Psyger wears samurai-style armor and a yellow demon mask.
A fishman swings. Stude cowers.
Psyger hammers one fishman, then another.
Sunraku leaps over FrillShark and strikes it in the back.
Akane and Ceecrue climb over the railing. FrillShark swings.
Sunraku side steps.
The anchor approaches. Akane leaps and lands on the deck.
The ship flashes black and white.
Sunraku dodge rolls away
FrillShark pants.
Sunraku strikes. FrillShark collapses.
In the deep of the water, octopus tentacles reach out.
Stude grabs a railing.
Lightning strikes the Innsman
The Innsman knocks back. Fishmen roll down the diagonal deck.
Mold holds the mast. Stude rolls, Psyger catches him.
The Innsman slides back into a spinning maelstrom.
A fishman falls overboard.
A purple tentacle raises up several stories in the air. Sunraku stares.
Tentacles as thick as the ship emerge.
They wrap around the ship.
The ship breaks in half. Dialog, Bonus Unique Scenario, The Abyss Lies Above in a World Turning Upside-Down. Beginning now.
The tentacles drag the ship under water.
Eyes open. Seaweed and coral cover rocks. The ocean surface glitters above them.
Sunraku lies on the deck of a shipwreck.
He scales the sideways ship.
City
Label, Abyssal Capital, Ruluiath
He sees a frilled eel near an anchor and a fish flapping near clothes.
Coral and moss grow on houses with boarded up windows.
A blue hand clutches a shoulder.
The blue shark man pants.
Label, Deep Abyss Moray
Special Status, Abyssal Time
The blue shark man runs down a parallel street
A hoard of zombie fishmen rampage down the street
They run through the after image
He runs to a dead end, and leaps up a wall. The fishmen bunch up at the wall. He ping pongs off nearby roofs.
The shark man pants on the roof.
They leap onto a nearby roof
They make their way down to the street.
Blonde mermaids watch from above the city. The top half is human, with long blond hair. They wear only a small, strappy blue bikini top. Starting at the hips, they have a long blue fish tail.
They swim away.
Merman, Araba
Label, Mermesis, Bagroon
A mermaid smiles wide
He blasts off from the roof, towards the floating mermaids.
He swings at a mermaid. She smiles, avoiding the blade.
He bounces off the a magic circle and flies back at her.
She gapes. Red pixels drift from her. She grabs her throat.
Damage -50
Veins throb on the furious mermaid.
No HP recovered
The mermaids fly towards him
Araba bites a mermaid
He flings the mermaid against a wall. She dissipates.
Friend = Weapon
Araba points up
The upside down city lies beneath the surface of the ocean.
Pixel art title card. Blue text over a starry background spell Shangri-La Frontier
Sunraku holds Ducsuram and stands in Ruluiath.
Pencilgon holds a golden spear and stands in the hidden garden
Katzo holds up fists and stands by the Teardrop lake
Psyger crosses her arms and stands in the Lightless Barrens
Montage of the game store, the Utopia headquarters, the palace, Rabbituza, a tower, and Fifticia.
Sunraku runs across Ruluiath, an underwater city. Fish swim in the air. Seaweed lines the street.
Katzo runs across the cave floor on the shores of the Teardrop lake
A serpent emerges from the lake. Crab pincers snap.
Montage of items. Log. Bow. Twin blue blades. Grimoire. Mana potion. Cards.
Pencilgon runs across the hidden garden. Red spider lilies blow in the breeze, surrounded by cavernous walls, under a full moon.
Ceecrue, Rust, Sunraku, Akane, Mold, and Psyger walk along a dock. A crescent moon shines over the sea.
The Scarlet Whale floats at sea. A giant octopus leg reaches up.
Rakuro, Towa, Kei, and a brown haired woman walk along an urban street. Cars drive by.
Montage. The Sage of Awakening. Akane's fox mask. Psyger in a yellow demon mask. An old man samurai. The beetle helm. A gas mask.
Blue text over a black background spells Shangri-La Frontier
